
// AUTO-GENERATED by camel-package-maven-plugin - DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
= camel get

Get status of Camel integrations


== Usage

[source,bash]
----
camel get [options]
----


== Subcommands

[cols="2,5",options="header"]
|===
| Subcommand | Description
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-bean.adoc[bean] | List beans in a running Camel integration
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-blocked.adoc[blocked] | Get blocked messages of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-circuit-breaker.adoc[circuit-breaker] | Get status of Circuit Breaker EIPs
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-consumer.adoc[consumer] | Get status of Camel consumers
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-context.adoc[context] | Get status of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-count.adoc[count] | Get total and failed exchanges
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-endpoint.adoc[endpoint] | Get usage of Camel endpoints
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-event.adoc[event] | Get latest events of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-groovy.adoc[groovy] | Groovy Sources used of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-group.adoc[group] | Get status of Camel route groups
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-health.adoc[health] | Get health check status of running Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-history.adoc[history] | History of latest completed exchange
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-inflight.adoc[inflight] | Get inflight messages of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-internal-task.adoc[internal-task] | List internal tasks of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-kafka.adoc[kafka] | List Kafka consumers of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-metric.adoc[metric] | Get metrics (micrometer) of running Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-platform-http.adoc[platform-http] | Get embedded HTTP services of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-processor.adoc[processor] | Get status of Camel processors
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-producer.adoc[producer] | Get status of Camel producers
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-properties.adoc[properties] | List configuration properties
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-rest.adoc[rest] | Get REST services of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-route.adoc[route] | Get status of Camel routes
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-route-controller.adoc[route-controller] | List status of route controller
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-route-dump.adoc[route-dump] | Dump Camel route in XML or YAML format
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-service.adoc[service] | Get services of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-source.adoc[source] | Display Camel route source code
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-startup-recorder.adoc[startup-recorder] | Display startup recording
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-transformer.adoc[transformer] | Get list of data type transformers
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-variable.adoc[variable] | List variables of Camel integrations
| xref:jbang-commands/camel-jbang-get-vault.adoc[vault] | List secrets from security vaults
|===



== Options

[cols="2,5,1,2",options="header"]
|===
| Option | Description | Default | Type
| `--watch` | Execute periodically and showing output fullscreen |  | boolean
| `-h,--help` | Display the help and sub-commands |  | boolean
|===
